scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../part2/features/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../../part3/features/
scripts.deploy: npm run build:ui && git stash && git fetch && git branch -D full_stack_open_deployment && git checkout -b full_stack_open_deployment && git stash pop && git add . && git commit -m deploy_script && git push origin full_stack_open_deployment -f && git reset HEAD^ && git stash && git checkout full_stack_open && git stash pop && rm -rf build/ && git checkout -- `git ls-files build`
